title: Gallery Conversation: Visualizing the Buddha
short_description: Join research fellow Nicolas Revire for stories and insights about the life of the Buddha and the visual art that spread Buddhism across Asia.
description: Join Daniel F. and Ada L. Rice Research Fellow Nicolas Revire for stories and insights about the life of the Buddha. Held in the Alsdorf galleries, the conversation will focus on the many centuries of visual art traditions that were produced as Buddhism spread across Asia.
